pages.text: 19|26|Tabe katsu nonde, anata no me o hiyashi nasai. Soshite moshi dareka o mitanaraba,“watashi wa jihibukaki omo ni, saikai no yakusoku o shimashita. Sorede kyo wa, dare tomo o hanashi itashimasen. ” To itte yaru ga i.'
19|27|Sorekara kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o daite jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaette kita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Maruyamu yo, anata wa, nanto taihen'na koto o shite kureta no ka.
19|28|Harun no shimai yo, anata no chichi wa warui hitode wa nakatta. Hahaoya mo futei no on'nade wa nakatta nodaga.'
19|29|Sokode kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o yubisashita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Doshite watashi-tachi wa, Yo kago no naka no akanbo ni hanasu koto ga dekiyou ka.'
19|30|(Sonotoki) kare (musuko) wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontoni arra no shimo bedesu. Kare wa keiten o watashi ni atae, mata watashi o yogen-sha ni nasa remashita.
19|31|Mata kare wa, watashi ga doko ni iyoutomo shukufuku o ataemasu. Mata seimei no aru kagiri reihai o sasage, kisha o suru yo, watashi ni o meiji ni narimashita.
19|32|Mata watashi no haha ni koyo o tsukusa se, koman'na megumarenai-sha ni nasa remasendeshita.
19|33|Mata watashi no shussei no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, watashi no ue ni heian ga arimasu yo ni.'
19|34|Sono ko to (isa ga maruyamu no kodearu koto) ni tsuite, kare-ra (Yudaya kyoto, kirisutokyoto) wa utagatte iruga hontoni shinjitsu sonomonodearu.
19|35|Arra ni kodomo ga dekiru nado to iu koto wa arienai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare ga ichiji o kettei sa re, tada `are.' To ose ni nareba, sunawachi aru nodearu.
19|36|Hontoni arra wa, watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso tadashi michidearu.
19|37|Sorenanoni kare-ra no ma de, sho shuha ga kotonaru. Shinjinai mono koso wazawaidearu. Idainaru Ni~Tsu no shinpan no tame ko.
19|38|Kare-ra ga wa ga mae ni makari deru hi, nanto hakkiri to kikoe mata mierudearou ka. Daga fugimono-tachi wa, kyo (gense de) wa akiraka ni 迷誤 No naka ni iru.
